disclosure_text: Standard credit terms with variable APR based on creditworthiness and market conditions. Rate applies to purchases and cash advances.
Premium credit terms with enhanced benefits and lower APR for qualified customers. Promotional rates available for balance transfers.

Student credit terms with reduced rates for educational expenses. Grace period applies during enrollment.

Travel credit terms with no foreign transaction fees and travel insurance coverage.
